SEARCH
Package services.authenticator

Class StaffLoginService

java.lang.Object
services.authenticator.StaffLoginService
All Implemented Interfaces:
iLoginService
public class StaffLoginService extends Object implements iLoginService
Service for authenticating staff logins and managing their passwords. This service is used by the StaffLoginPage

  • Method Details

    • login

      public boolean login(String username, String password)
      Authenticates a staff login attempt using the provided username and password.
      Specified by:
      login in interface iLoginService
      Parameters:
      username - The username entered by the staff.
      password - The password entered by the staff.
      Returns:
      true if the login attempt is successful, false otherwise.

    • getStaffByID

      public Staff getStaffByID(String userID)
      Returns a staff object by their user ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID of the staff.
      Returns:
      The staff object with the specified user ID, or null if not found.

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String userID, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Facilitates the changing of a staff's password.
      Specified by:
      changePassword in interface iLoginService
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID of the staff.
      oldPassword - The old password of the staff.
      newPassword - The new password to be set.
      Returns:
      true if the password change is successful, false otherwise.
